snippet.title: Port's savage banner burn
snippet.content:
OUCH. Port Adelaide's cheer squad took first blood in Sunday's Showdown, with this very cutting banner. If you don't understand that list item, Port's cheersquad had teased the banner the day before: Twitter was swift to react.
Port's banner was ðŸ‘ŒðŸ˜‚
No issues with the Port banner. A little bit of banter is fine...as long as we win.
But not everyone saw the funny side.
Lol banner, so let's do one for them on behalf of hmm port fan checklist 1) don't show up 2) talk about the crows
Port Cheersquad is actually pathetic aren't they?! Banner for the Crows. Yeah we aren't the ones who never show up.
Your move, Crows fans.
